description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Brixx is a traditional board game in a new exciting outfit.  Aim of the game is to get more stones of your kind than your opponent. Both players move one after another. If it's your turn, you have to place an own stone on an empty field next to an opponent's stone so that this stone or a row of stones is between your stones. The game is over if no one can place a stone.
